Screen.name: invoiceHelp
Screen.Map:
} Invoice List Help]
Invoices are displayed in date order starting with the oldest invoice first.
If there is more than one page of invoices, the MORE... will display on the bottom line and F8 can be used, otherwise the word LAST...will display.
If the PAGE field at the top is 1, then the F7 key will display an error as there are no prior invoices to display.
When paid amount is less than the invoice amount, the Total Balance column will grow. Received checks are applied against outstanding invoices--to see received checks, use the CLEAR to return to the home screen and select the Transactions.
Press Enter to return to the active Invoice screen...
